languages.text: "Если вести дела он собирался с представителями Человечества". {n}Голос Хейнрикса глух и тих, словно у дознавателя вдруг закончились силы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если вести дела он собирался с представителями Человечества". {n}Голос Хейнрикса глух и тих, словно у дознавателя вдруг закончились силы.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если вести дела он собирался с представителями Человечества". {n}Голос Хейнрикса глух и тих, словно у дознавателя вдруг закончились силы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They would if they were going to do business with members of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator were suddenly drained of all his strength.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They would if they were going to do business with members of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator were suddenly drained of all his strength.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They would if they were going to do business with members of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator had suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果那些异形得到了人类叛徒的协助，那他们就会选择这种地方。”{n}海因里希的声音沉闷而平静，仿佛突然之间耗尽了所有力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果那些异形得到了人类叛徒的协助，那他们就会选择这种地方。”{n}海因里希的声音沉闷而平静，仿佛突然之间耗尽了所有力量。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Würden sie, wenn sie Geschäfte mit Vertretern der Menschheit machen würden." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist dumpf und still, als wäre plötzlich alle Kraft aus dem Interrogator gewichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Würden sie, wenn sie Geschäfte mit Mitgliedern der Menschheit machen würden." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist dumpf und still, als wäre plötzlich alle Kraft aus dem Interrogator gewichen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lo harían si estuviesen conchabados con representantes de la Humanidad». {n}La voz de Heinrix suena apagada, como si el interrogador hubiese desfallecido de repente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo harían si estuviesen conchabados con ciudadanos del Imperium». {n}La voz de Heinrix suena apagada, como si el interrogador hubiese desfallecido de repente.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être faire affaire avec des représentants de l'humanité, » {n}répond Heinrix d'une voix calme et monotone, comme s'il avait soudainement perdu toutes ses forces.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être faire affaire avec des membres de l'humanité, » {n}répond Heinrix d'une voix calme et monotone, comme s'il avait soudainement perdu toutes ses forces.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「人類の代表と取引するつもりなら、そうするだろう」{n}ハインリックスの声は鈍く静かで、まるでインテロゲイターは突然力を使い果たしたかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「人類の代表と取引するつもりなら、そうするだろう」{n}ハインリックスの声は鈍く静かで、まるでインテロゲイターは突然力を使い果たしたかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İnsanlık elçileriyle çalışıyorlarsa böyle yerde işleri de olur." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, kısık ve boğuk geliyor. Sorgucu'nun hiç takati kalmamış sanki.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would if they were going to do business with representatives of Humanity." {n}Heinrix's voice is dull and quiet, as if the Interrogator has suddenly been drained of all his strength.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlık elçileriyle çalışıyorlarsa böyle yerde de işleri olur." {n}Heinrix'in sesi kısık ve boğuk geliyor. Sorgucu'nun hiç takati kalmamış sanki.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
